django.contrib.gis.db.backends.base.operations
==============================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.db.backends.base.operations


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.db.backends.base.operations.BaseSpatialOperations


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: BaseSpatialOperations

   .. py:attribute:: postgis
      :value: False



   .. py:attribute:: spatialite
      :value: False



   .. py:attribute:: mariadb
      :value: False



   .. py:attribute:: mysql
      :value: False



   .. py:attribute:: oracle
      :value: False



   .. py:attribute:: spatial_version
      :value: None



   .. py:attribute:: select
      :value: '%s'



   .. py:method:: select_extent()


   .. py:attribute:: disallowed_aggregates
      :value: ()



   .. py:attribute:: geom_func_prefix
      :value: ''



   .. py:attribute:: function_names


   .. py:attribute:: unsupported_functions


   .. py:attribute:: from_text
      :value: False



   .. py:method:: convert_extent(box, srid)
      :abstractmethod:



   .. py:method:: convert_extent3d(box, srid)
      :abstractmethod:



   .. py:method:: geo_quote_name(name)


   .. py:method:: geo_db_type(f)
      :abstractmethod:


      Return the database column type for the geometry field on
      the spatial backend.



   .. py:method:: get_distance(f, value, lookup_type)
      :abstractmethod:


      Return the distance parameters for the given geometry field,
      lookup value, and lookup type.



   .. py:method:: get_geom_placeholder(f, value, compiler)

      Return the placeholder for the given geometry field with the given
      value.  Depending on the spatial backend, the placeholder may contain a
      stored procedure call to the transformation function of the spatial
      backend.



   .. py:method:: check_expression_support(expression)


   .. py:method:: spatial_aggregate_name(agg_name)
      :abstractmethod:



   .. py:method:: spatial_function_name(func_name)


   .. py:method:: geometry_columns()
      :abstractmethod:



   .. py:method:: spatial_ref_sys()
      :abstractmethod:



   .. py:attribute:: distance_expr_for_lookup


   .. py:method:: get_db_converters(expression)


   .. py:method:: get_geometry_converter(expression)
      :abstractmethod:



   .. py:method:: get_area_att_for_field(field)


   .. py:method:: get_distance_att_for_field(field)
